content: hey guys I'm going to show you how to take two half-full bottles of white glue
and combine them into one so just remove the tops from each bottle and put those
aside and now we're just going to invert the one bottle on top and make sure that
it's exactly over the hole of the other bottle just let that sit for about a
half an hour and yeah make sure it's all lined up and that should all just drain
into the two the second bottle and while that's doing going on you can get a
plastic bowl of water take the tops and open the top so you get some water flow
in there and just immerse those into the water make sure they're nice and getting
water in there so can I get them in there play them a bit and then just let
them sit so I'm glad them said you can see that glue is leaked out of those
into the bottom of the plastic thing and I'll just lift it up and you can see
there's some water flow going through that one which is nice that's good
now the other one here is kind of clogged up so on my choice I think I'm
going to take the one that seems less clogged up and that's a good way to do
that so I'll just use my little paper towel and just wiped out the excess glue
wipe it off the tip and on the inside and that would be ready to put on the
bottle so here I've got my bottles they've been sitting there a half an
hour and it's totally emptied out from the one to the other now I'll just put
the lid on there and I will be good to go and I have a full almost full bottle
of glue and got rid of the other half one
